result.eng: The problem was growing from year to year.
result.ga: Bhí an fhadhb ag fás ó bhliain go bliain
result.orig: Bhí an fhadhb ag fás ó bhliain go bliain
result.html: Bhí an fhadhb ag fás ó bhliain go bliainThe problem was growing from year to year.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an ḟaḋb ag fás ó ḃliain go bliainThe problem was growing from year to year.

result.eng: it was a long year.
result.ga: Bliain fhada ab ea é
result.orig: Bliain fhada ab ea é
result.html: Bliain fhada ab ea éit was a long year.
result.ponchtml: Bliain ḟada ab ea éit was a long year.

result.eng: We spent a year and a half doing that work.
result.ga: Chaith muid bliain go leith i mbun na hoibre
result.orig: Chaith muid bliain go leith i mbun na hoibre
result.html: Chaith muid bliain go leith i mbun na hoibreWe spent a year and a half doing that work.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ muid bliain go leiṫ i mbun na hoibreWe spent a year and a half doing that work.

result.eng: I spent a year doing that work.
result.ga: Chaith mé bliain i mbun na hoibre sin
result.orig: Chaith mé bliain i mbun na hoibre sin
result.html: Chaith mé bliain i mbun na hoibre sinI spent a year doing that work.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ mé bliain i mbun na hoibre sinI spent a year doing that work.

result.eng: She had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.
result.ga: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sin
result.orig: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sin

result.eng: Two men twenty years of age were taken to prison.
result.ga: Cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosún

result.html: Cuireadh beirt fhear fiche bliain d'aois i bpríosúnTwo men twenty years of age were taken to prison.

result.eng: We do the same thing year after year.
result.ga: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh bliana
result.orig: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh bliana
result.html: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh blianaWe do the same thing year after year.

result.eng: He enlisted in the army when he was 18 years of age.

result.eng: Thousands of people come year after year to take part in the festival.
result.ga: Tagann na mílte daoine bliain i ndiaidh bliana chun páirt a ghlacadh san fhéile
result.orig: Tagann na mílte daoine bliain i ndiaidh bliana chun páirt a ghlacadh san fhéile

result.eng: He referred to a case that happened fourty years ago.

result.eng: Big money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.

result.eng: I am twenty years of age.

result.eng: The attacks were apparently being planned by Osama Bin Laden's soldiers for several years.
